content.description: This is the left-most route on the cliff.

climbs.name: Ghouls Just Wanna Have Fun
climbs.fa: Bob Gaines and Chris Baumann, November 2014

content.description: This is the second route from the left. Climb the steep face up to a horizontal crack. Hand jam right, then move up to clip a lower-off anchor. The gyrations to clip the anchor are all part of the fun.

climbs.name: The Friendly Ghost
climbs.fa: Bob Gaines and Chris Baumann, January 2015

content.description: This is a toprope variation of Bewitched. Start on Bewitched, move left on slab moves, then power through an overhanging section past horizontals.

climbs.name: Saw
climbs.fa: Bob Gaines and Ron Herschberg, February, 2015

content.description: 5 ft. left of Trick or Treat. Face climb to a lieback flake, move up to an undercling, then, moving slightly right, power over a bulge on jugs.
content.protection: Toprope form the Trick or Treat bolt anchor.

climbs.name: Carving Pumpkins
climbs.fa: Chris Baumann and Bob Gaines, December 2014

content.description:
This is the longest route on the cliff, second from the right.

Start with an undercling, then power through (10b/c; somewhat height dependent) a slightly overhanging bulge to a ledge (3 bolts). Continue up an easier corner on orange varnish past a 4th and 5th bolt, then, at the 6th bolt, move left at a tricky undercling (5.10-), then back right past a 7th bolt up to the top and a chain anchor.

The 7th bolt was not used on the first ascent and was added later to protect the follower (or for toproping) from a bad swing and potential injurious fall.

A harder (10+) direct finish has been toproped: move right at the 6th bolt and power over an overhang. No need to clip the 7th bolt for a directional if toproping the direct finish.

Beware of crumbly rock at the ledge half way up and at the very top.
content.protection: 7 bolts to a 2-bolt chain lower-off/rappel anchor.

climbs.name: Bewitched
climbs.fa: Chris Baumann and Bob Gaines, January 2015

content.description: This is the furthest route to the right.
content.protection: 4 bolts to a 2-bolt lower-off/rappel chain anchor.
